meanings.definition: Able to withstand wear, pressure, or damage.
meanings.sent1: The sturdy backpack was durable enough to survive the rough hike.
meanings.sent2: The durable shoes lasted through many walks in the park.
meanings.sent3: The durable umbrella refused to give up even in the strongest storm.
meanings.sent4: Her friendship was as durable as a diamond, unbreakable and precious.
meanings.sent5: The durable steel frame of the building ensured its safety during the earthquake.

meanings.definition: Lasting a long time without deterioration.
meanings.sent1: The durable fabric of the curtains stayed vibrant for years.
meanings.sent2: The durable paint on the walls kept its color despite the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The durable cookie jar seemed to magically refill itself every night.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was as durable as an ancient oak tree, growing stronger with time.
meanings.sent5: The durable memories of their childhood adventures stayed fresh in their minds.

meanings.sent1: The durable soldier faced every challenge with unwavering courage.
meanings.sent2: The durable spirit of the team never wavered, even in tough times.
meanings.sent3: The durable clock ticked on, refusing to stop despite being dropped.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as durable as a mountain, unyielding to any obstacle.
meanings.sent5: The durable bond between the siblings kept them close no matter the distance.
